overview: Niskala, who since childhood was really cared for by his family and friends because he has a mental health disorder or bipolar. Niskala was close friends with Dinda and Anus from childhood until college. In college, a young man named Pram was seen admiring Niskala from afar. Pram's attempt to attract Niskala's attention paid off. At that time Pram challenged Niskala to get an A in his college assignment.
tagline: Kau yang singgah, tapi tak sungguh
title: Kukira Kau Rumah
